item.title: Next month StackOverflow will pass a catastrophic point in its history
item.description: I’ve used StackOverflow a lot. I’m not just talking about landing there from Google; I’ve been regularly participating for about four years.

item.title: Design Patterns Reviewed - Part 1: Creational
item.description: This is the first post in a series in which I’ll be reviewing software design patterns, giving my opinions on which you should use and which you should avoid.

item.title: Stop Using Maven Deploy
item.description: mvn deploy is the final phase of Maven’s build lifecycle. It’s responsible for uploading the artifacts produced by the previous phases of the build to an artifact repository like Nexus where they can be stored and accessed by other dependent projects, or used as part of an automated deployment.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Michael Boyles. I’m a software developer working in the finance industry in London.
